metadata.description: Robots, aliens, and a spunky teenaged girl. John Byrne explores a whole new way of storytelling in "Stowaway to the Stars," where Byrne (Star Trek New Visions, John Byrne's Next Men) takes you on a journey through brand-new worlds and galaxies with this beautiful series of full-page, full-color illustrations, accompanied by a light, evocative, science-fiction storyline.
metadata.name: John Byrne's Stowaway to the Stars
